short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides Streamers from the sidebar on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small extension that allows you to hide streamers you don't want to see in the sidebar on Twitch. Simply enter a comma-separated list of streamers' titles, and the extension will automatically remove them from your view. Enhance your Twitch browsing experience by customizing which content appears on your screen.
